needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: The secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza are goat cheese, which adds a tangy and creamy flavor to the traditional pizza sauce, and garlic, which provides a pungent and aromatic taste to the pizza.
